Euler Angles

Z-Y-X rotation sequence:

\[\begin{split}\rot_{zyx} = \begin{bmatrix} c(\psi) c(\theta) & c(\psi) s(\theta) s(\phi) - s(\psi) c(\phi) & c(\psi) s(\theta) c(\phi) + s(\psi) s(\phi) \\ s(\psi) c(\theta) & s(\psi) s(\theta) s(\phi) + c(\psi) c(\phi) & s(\psi) s(\theta) c(\phi) - c(\psi) s(\phi) \\ -s(\theta) & c(\theta) s(\phi) & c(\theta) c(\phi) \end{bmatrix}\end{split}\]
